headline: CTI CRYOGENICS CRYOGENIC VACUUM PUMP 2700 HOURS, 8" CF

specstable:
Manufacturer CTI Cryogenics
Model ON-BOARD 8 Low hours
Inlet Flange Conflat 203.2 mm (8.000 in)
Foreline Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Pumping Speed Water Vapor 4,000.00 l/s (8,476.37 CFM)
Pumping Speed Air 1,500.00 l/s (3,178.64 CFM)
Pumping Speed Hydrogen 2,500.00 l/s (5,297.73 CFM)
Full Regeneration Time 150 Minutes
Other Information
Part # 8112873G001

Pneumatic roughing valve not shown in the picture is included.
Excellent condition, arrays are like new, low run hours ranging from 2707 to 2680.
On-Board module refurbished.
A CTI ONBOARD remote keypad is available. See Item 49424.
Compressor and helium lines not included.

Condition Excellent
Exterior Dimensions
